SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwTRSothaMachine02Script

;controls act_sotha_monster2
;script controls the second lever and the second door only

;script sotha_machine1 controls decides if fabricants are made 
;and plays the anims for everything, opens the doors, etc

short state		;the state of the lever, 0 down, 1 up
short move		;tells the lever and door to move


;******************************************
;  turn lever and open the door
;
;******************************************

begin Onactivate

;can only move this lever if the first door is shut, otherwise, play sound

	if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State == 0 )
		set move to 1
	else
		PlaySound 0LockedDoor
	endif

end

begin gamemode

	if  ( move == 1 )

;animate the lever
		if ( state == 0 )
			PlayGroup forward 1
			set state to 1
		else
			PlayGroup backward 1 
			set state to 0
		endif

;animate the door
		if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor2State == 0 )

;push anims on to open
			fbmwactUsothaUmachUdoor2.PlayGroup forward 1
			set  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor2State to 1

		else	
;push anims on to close
			fbmwactUsothaUmachUdoor2.PlayGroup backward 1
			set  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor2State to 0

		endif

		set move to 0

	endif

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 35 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
